attributes.action: Put more police on the streets and less doing pointless tasks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To put more police on the streets and arm them with guns instead of tazers and batons. Take more police from doing the pointless stop checks. There is so much crime on the streets and the only place I see the police is in groups of ten stop checking cars.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
